scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd backend && npm run start && cd .." "cd frontend && npm run start && cd .."
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint && cd .." "cd frontend && npm run lint && cd .."
scripts.type-check: concurrently "cd backend && npm run type-check && cd .." "cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd .."
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:unified && npm run type-check:build
